儵字的基本解释

儵
shū
同“倏”。

儵字的汉语字典释义

[①]［shū］
［《廣韻》式竹切，入屋，書。］
(1)黑色。
(2)同“倏”。疾速。
(3)神名。南海之神为儵。参见“儵忽”。
[②]［tiáo］
通“鯈1”。
参见“儵2魚”。
[③]［yōu］
见“儵3儵”。

儵字的康熙字典解释

【子集中】【人字部】　儵； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页121第29
【集韻】倏本字。【楚辭·九歌】儵而來兮忽而逝。【莊子·應帝王】南海之帝爲儵，北海之帝爲忽，中央之帝爲混沌。　又靑黑色。【說文】靑黑繒發白色。一曰儵儵，罹禍毒也。　【說文】列?部，俗誤借倏，?譌作倏。唐褚遂良作儵，以當?字，讀若?入聲，非是。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［shū］
["Guangyun" style bamboo cut, enter the house, book. ]
(1) Black.
(2) Same as "quick". Fast.
(3) God's name. The god of the South China Sea is swift. See "Suddenly".
[②]［tiáo］
Same as "Minnow 1".
See "倏2 fish".
[③] [yōu]

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Subset] [Human Character Department] 　倏; Kangxi Strokes: 19; Page Number: Page 121 29
【Jiyun】The original character. [Songs of Chu·Nine Songs] Suddenly come and die suddenly. [Zhuangzi·Emperor Ying] The emperor of the South China Sea is 倏, the emperor of the North Sea is Su, and the emperor of the Central is Chaos.　It's black again. [Said the text] The black hair is white. One said swiftly, disasters and poisons.　【Said the text】Listed in the department, the common mistake borrowed from the old man, and the old man was the old man. Tang Chu Suiliang made a succinct word, and read it as if it was a sound, no yes.
